statements: SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE age < 18
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' OR medical_history LIKE '%hypertension%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age < 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE hospital_id = 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, blood_type FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'O+'
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.hospital_id = 1
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT diagnosis_id, patient_id, diagnosis_date, diagnosis_result FROM Diagnosis WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis_result FROM Patients JOIN Diagnosis ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnosis.patient_id;
SELECT diagnosis_id, diagnosis_date, diagnosis_result FROM Diagnosis WHERE diagnosis_result LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT Doctors.full_name, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT history_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT full_name, specialization, hospital FROM Doctors ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT p.full_name, d.full_name, a.appointment_date FROM Appointments a JOIN Patients p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT patient_id, height, weight FROM Patients ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Treatments WHERE patient_id=3 ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, weight FROM Patients WHERE height > 160;
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN DoctorAppointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = DoctorAppointments.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'F';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_date, treatment_plan FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
